title: Cover image disappears while scrolling the Queue

labels.name: Type: Confirmed bug
labels.description: Bugs confirmed by a lead developer

body:
### Checklist

- [X] I have used the search function for [open](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues) **and** [closed](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed) issues to see if someone else has already submitted the same bug report.
- [X] I will describe the problem with as much detail as possible.
- [X] If the bug only to occurs with a certain podcast, I will include the URL of that podcast.

### App version

2.5.2

### Where did you get the app from

F-Droid

### Android version

Android 10 (stock EMUI 11.0.0.174)

### Device model

Huawei P30 pro

### First occurred

yesterday and now (i.e. ever since I installed the app)

### Steps to reproduce

1. I have `Use Episode Cover` set of `off` in settings
2. I subscribed (via mobile data connection) to podcast for which AntennaPod seems to auto-generates cover with name of the podcast (e.g. https://girlinspace.libsyn.com/rss - I have no idea why it doesn't pick up the podcast image which seems to be there when I open in other RSS readers?)
3. when I opened `Queue` list, I can see all podcast cover, but this specific one is just white text "Girl in space" on light gray background
4. I scroll down several episodes
5. I scroll back up, and the cover image for that podcast is gone (i.e. replaced by almost black image , actually very very dark grey, image)

Other podcast (for which AntennaPod seems to have correct real image) are not affected and their cover images remain static when scrolling.

### Expected behaviour

I would expect when scrolling the `Queue` down and back up the cover images wouldn't disappear, but instead remain the same as they were before.

### Current behaviour

cover image for every instance of that specific podcast that has scrolled off the screen disappears when I scroll back in. See attached video:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/156656/171711149-610b9158-661b-4f38-bedb-cc3b1f8ca521.mp4


### Logs

_No response_
